name: dice_default_message
value:
Welcome to Dice game bot
!dice help

name: dice_game_created
value: The game is created for {count} of players, you have 30 seconds to join send !dice join

name: dice_game_wrong_creation
value: (n) You have to put a balance, send "!dice <balance>"

name: dice_game_invalid_balance
value: (n) The balance must be multiples of 500 and less than 5000

name: dice_game_finish
value: (n) The game is over

name: dice_game_already_created
value: (n) There is a game already created send "!dice join" to join

name: dice_game_already_start
value: (n) There is already a game, please wait for game to end

name: dice_game_join
value: (y) {nickname} ({id} ) joined the game

name: dice_game_already_join
value: (n) {nickname} ({id} ) You are already joined

name: dice_game_notexist
value: (n) There is no game available right now send "!dice new" to create a new game
